sentences.sContent: The dealers applied for an export licence.
sentences.sCn: 经销商申请了出口许可证。

sentences.sContent: He was arrested for driving without a license.
The Tennessee Valley Authority applied for a license to operate the facility.
sentences.sCn: 田纳西河谷管理局申请了这个场所的经营执照。

sentences.sContent: The owner of land could grant a licence to cut and remove timber.
sentences.sCn: 土地所有者可发执照授权砍伐和运走木材。

sentences.sContent: I forgot to renew my licence.
sentences.sCn: 我忘记去办理执照展期了。

sentences.sContent: Persistent offenders face losing their licence.
sentences.sCn: 多次违规者将会被没收执照。

phrases.pCn: 驾驶执照；汽车驾驶执照
出口许可证，输出许可证

words.tran: 得到许可的；领有执照的
持牌人；执照持有者；获许可的人；领到执照的人
领到执照的人；获许可的人
许可（licence的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranOther: an official document giving you permission to own or do something for a period of time
